title: Formalize Health Check Specification and Quality Standards

context.background: RFC 0001 and ADR 0001 define health monitoring. ecosystem-manifest is the single source of truth for MCP ecosystem standards. Need to formalize health check spec so all servers implement consistently and monitoring service knows what to expect.

deliverables: QUALITY_STANDARDS.md updated (health endpoint now required for ecosystem inclusion)
acceptance_criteria: Health check spec defines all required/optional fields from ADR 0001
Spec includes example responses for ok/degraded/down states
Spec defines error handling (timeouts, HTTP codes)
Quality standards require health endpoint for ecosystem inclusion
ecosystem-manifest.yaml declares health_check_spec as provided capability
dependencies: coord-001 (chora-base template) should complete first (shows reference implementation)

decision.rationale: P0 blocker for W3. Depends on coord-001 but can start in parallel. Clear requirements from ADR 0001. Ecosystem-manifest is the right home for this specification.
